item.title: KKR 将在与 Döpfner 的交易中卸下 Axel Springer 媒体资产
item.description: KKR & Co.和德国亿万富翁马蒂亚斯-多普弗纳（Mathias Döpfner）同意分拆媒体集团阿克塞尔-施普林格（Axel Springer），将其快速增长的分类广告部门从新闻业务中分离出来。【原文：KKR & Co. and German billionaire Mathias Döpfner agreed to split up media conglomerate Axel Springer, separating its fast-growing classifieds units from its news businesses.】

item.title: 英国央行维持利率不变后，英镑创 2022 年 3 月以来新高
item.description: 在英国央行维持利率稳定并表示不会急于放宽政策后，英镑兑美元汇率升至两年多来的最高水平。【原文：The pound rose to its highest level in more than two years against the dollar after the Bank of England held interest rates steady and said it won’t rush to ease policy.】

item.title: 英国央行明年将削减 1,000 亿英镑债券投资组合
item.description: 英国央行将保持削减债券资产负债表的步伐，这一决定可能会影响到英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在即将到来的预算中的财政火力。【原文：The Bank of England will maintain the pace it is reducing its balance sheet of bonds, a decision that may have implications for how much fiscal firepower Chancellor Rachel Reeves has at the upcoming budget.】

item.title: TikTok 禁用令渐成现实，而应用程序用户却忽视了这一点
item.description: TikTok 在美国的前景突然变得更加暗淡了，尽管你在使用这款应用时不会意识到这一点。但首先...【原文：TikTok’s future in the US is suddenly looking much more dire, though you wouldn’t know from using the app. But first...】

item.title: 乌克兰延长利率暂停期，通胀加剧
item.description: 乌克兰中央银行连续第二次会议维持利率不变，这表明尽管战时预算日益紧张，但决策者不会容忍通货膨胀率上升。【原文：Ukraine’s central bank left interest rates unchanged for a second straight meeting in a sign that policymakers won’t tolerate higher inflation despite growing strains on the war-time budget.】

item.title: 英国央行决定维持利率不变，誓言采取渐进式宽松政策
item.description: 英国央行警告投资者，它不会急于放松货币政策，决定不连续第二次下调借贷成本，因为它在等待通胀压力已经消退的进一步迹象。【原文：The Bank of England warned investors it won’t rush to ease monetary policy, deciding against a second consecutive cut in borrowing costs as it awaits further signs inflationary pressures have subsided.】

item.title: 华尔街 5.1 万亿美元的三重魔咒是下一个市场考验
item.description: 就在华尔街交易员对美联储的减息政策跃跃欲试之际，周五的美国期权到期日又可能给市场带来更多冲击。【原文：Just as Wall Street traders come to grips with the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut, Friday’s US options expiration threatens to whipsaw the market some more.】

item.title: 中国与欧盟贸易官员就电动汽车关税问题举行最后谈判
item.description: 中国的主要贸易官员正在欧洲进行最后的努力，以避免在几天后的最后期限前对电动汽车征收迫在眉睫的关税。【原文：China’s lead trade official is in Europe on a last-ditch mission to avert looming tariffs on electric cars ahead of a deadline that’s only days away.】

item.title: 德国邮政获得唯一 "卖出 "评级，因为 Exane 提示盈利风险
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas Exane）称，分析师可能需要下调对这家德国物流集团的盈利预期，德国邮政股份公司的股票六个月来首次获得卖出等价评级。【原文：Deutsche Post AG shares got their first sell-equivalent rating in six months as BNP Paribas Exane said analysts may need to slash earnings estimates for the German logistics group.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡宣布与债券持有人重组
item.description: 斯里兰卡表示，它已与债券持有人原则上达成协议，对约126亿美元的债券进行重组，而此时距离该国即将举行令投资者感到震惊的大选只有几天时间。【原文：Sri Lanka said it’s reached an agreement in principle with bondholders to restructure about $12.6 billion in bonds, just days before the country heads to elections that have rattled investors.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储的半点降息在市场和其他央行的背景中激起波澜，对更多降息的押注也在增加。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The Fed’s half-point interest rate cut ripples through markets and the backdrop for other central banks, as bets for more ramp up. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 尽管竞争加剧，Ethio Telecom 的销售额仍有望增长 75
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚国有电信运营商首席执行官 Frehiwot Tamru 表示，尽管面临日益激烈的竞争，该公司仍计划在本财年将收入提高 75%。【原文：Ethiopia’s state-owned telecommunications operator aims to boost its revenue by 75% in the current financial year, even as it faces increased competition, according to Chief Executive Officer Frehiwot Tamru.】

item.title: 德意志银行聘请瑞银集团加瑟管理德国财富部门
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）聘请拉斐尔-加瑟（Raffael Gasser）担任财富管理和私人银行业务德国区主管，私人银行主管克劳迪奥-德桑克蒂斯（Claudio de Sanctis）的另一位前同事将担任重要职务。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG hired Raffael Gasser as head of wealth management and private banking Germany, tapping another former colleague of Private Bank head Claudio de Sanctis for a key role.】

item.title: 西班牙坏账银行将开始出售价值 8 亿欧元的房地产部门
item.description: 西班牙不良银行计划出售房地产开发商 Arqura Homes，这是该银行持有的最大资产之一，资产价值约为 8 亿欧元（8.94 亿美元）。【原文：Spain’s bad bank plans to sell real estate developer Arqura Homes, one of its biggest holdings with assets valued at around €800 million ($894 million).】

item.title: 爱尔兰总理民调上升为提前大选增添压力
item.description: 爱尔兰时报》的一项民意调查显示，爱尔兰现任总理西蒙-哈里斯的支持率随着其所在政党支持率的上升而飙升，这一结果很可能会增加他在今年秋天举行大选的压力。【原文：Support for Ireland’s incumbent prime minister, Taoiseach Simon Harris, has jumped along with increases for his party, according to an Irish Times poll, results which will likely add pressure for him to call a general election this autumn.】

item.title: 德国央行称德国可能已陷入轻度衰退
item.description: 德国联邦银行表示，德国经济可能已经陷入衰退，但从目前的情况来看，出现严重经济滑坡的可能性不大。【原文：Germany’s economy may already be in recession, but a severe economic slump looks unlikely as things stand, according to the Bundesbank.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚修订棕榈油征税条例以增加出口
item.description: 印度尼西亚财政部发布了修订棕榈油出口税的新规定，以促进这个世界最大种植国的热带商品出口。【原文：Indonesia’s Finance Ministry issued new regulations to revise the palm oil export levies, in a bid to boost shipments of the tropical commodity from the world’s biggest grower.】

item.title: 反洗钱金融行动特别工作组呼吁更严格地检查印度的贵金属交易
item.description: 据全球反洗钱监督机构称，印度必须加强对涉及贵金属和宝石交易的检查，因为其中一些交易是以现金形式进行的，不属于典型的监督程序范围。【原文：India must tighten checks on transactions involving precious metals and stones as several of these deals are conducted in cash and fall outside the purview of typical monitoring procedures, according to a global anti-money-laundering watchdog.】

item.title: 肯尼亚财政部敦促在借贷利率高企的情况下实行财政纪律
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部呼吁在使用公共资源时遵守更多的纪律，因为国内利率水平较高，导致借贷成本高昂。【原文：Kenya’s Treasury called for more discipline in the use of public resources because of the high level of domestic interest rates that make borrowing expensive.】

item.title: 帕内塔说，意大利南部需要促进增长的投资
item.description: 意大利银行行长法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，意大利南部地区需要能够持久促进该地区经济发展的投资。【原文：Italy’s South needs investments that can help boost the area’s economy in a lasting way, Bank of Italy Governor Fabio Panetta said.】

item.title: 摩根大通支持美联储大幅减息。但对下一步行动不太确定
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）是周三正确预测美联储降息半点的华尔街巨头之一。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co., the one Wall Street titan to correctly call the Federal Reserve’s half-point interest-rate cut on Wednesday, says another big reduction hinges on the US labor market getting weaker.】

item.title: 美联储首次减息后交易员转向数据，国债上涨
item.description: 美国国债小幅上涨，因为交易员们将注意力从备受期待的降息转移到了劳动力市场的状况上。【原文：US Treasuries posted small gains as traders turned the page on a highly-anticipated interest-rate cut, with focus back on the state of the labor market.】

item.title: 因猜测 MBK 将提高报价，韩国锌业股价大涨
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.）股价跃升至创纪录水平，原因是市场猜测私募股权公司 MBK Partners 将提高收购报价，以获得这家全球最大金属精炼商的控制权。【原文：Korea Zinc Co. shares jumped to a record on speculation private equity firm MBK Partners will raise its offer to gain control of the world’s biggest refiner of the metal.】

item.title: 印尼意外降息后，经济学家押注印尼将采取更多宽松政策
item.description: 印尼银行本周先于美联储降息，令市场大吃一惊，预计印尼银行今年将继续降低借贷成本，但降息速度将慢于美国。【原文：Bank Indonesia, which surprised markets this week by cutting interest rates ahead of the Federal Reserve, is expected to keep lowering borrowing costs this year, but at a slower pace than in the US.】

item.title: 苹果面临欧盟开放 iPhone 操作系统的警告
item.description: 苹果公司将受到欧盟的警告，要求其向竞争对手的技术开放其严加防范的 iPhone 操作系统，否则最终将面临巨额罚款。【原文：Apple Inc. is set to be warned by the European Union to open up its highly guarded iPhone operating system to rival technologies, or eventually risk significant fines.】

item.title: 国际能源署称计划终止经乌克兰输送俄罗斯天然气
item.description: 国际能源机构表示，它正计划在今年年底过境协议到期后停止俄罗斯天然气流经乌克兰，并警告说基辅及其邻国将面临一个艰难的冬天。【原文：The International Energy Agency said it’s planning for an end to Russian gas flows through Ukraine after a transit deal expires at the end of the year, warning of a tough winter ahead for Kyiv and its neighbors.】

item.title: 捷克政府计划因洪灾增加预算赤字
item.description: 捷克财政部长兹比内克-斯坦尤拉（Zbynek Stanjura）表示，捷克政府将增加今明两年的财政赤字，以弥补近期大范围洪灾造成的部分损失。【原文：The Czech government will increase fiscal deficits planned for this year and next to cover part of the damage caused by recent widespread floods, according to Finance Minister Zbynek Stanjura.】

item.title: 十年来最大规模外资买入后，巴基斯坦股市创下历史新高
item.description: 由于强劲的外资流入和宏观经济指标的改善提振了市场情绪，巴基斯坦股市在周四的交易中创下历史新高。【原文：Stocks in Pakistan rose to a record high during trading on Thursday as robust foreign inflows and improving macro-economic indicators boost sentiment.】

item.title: 菲亚特克莱斯勒中国工厂拍卖第三次失败
item.description: 菲亚特-克莱斯勒破产的中国合资企业的管理人在拍卖会上第三次未能售出位于中国南方的一家合资汽车厂，尽管价格下降了三分之一以上，这表明全球最大的汽车市场对内燃机的需求不足。【原文：The administrator for Fiat Chrysler’s bankrupt Chinese venture failed to sell a jointly run auto factory in Southern China for a third time at auction, despite slashing the price by more than a third, indicating the lack of demand for internal combustion engines in the world’s largest car market.】

item.title: Vonovia 交易为埃利奥特的 Deutsche Wohnen 赌注提供了出路
item.description: 在激进股东埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management LP）长达数年的活动之后，德国住宅业主 Vonovia SE 表示准备向子公司的小股东提供优惠条件，以换取更严格的控制权。【原文：German residential landlord Vonovia SE said it’s prepared to offer sweeteners to minority shareholders of a subsidiary in exchange for tighter control, following a yearslong campaign by activist shareholder Elliott Investment Management LP.】
